instruction: Propose a design for a mobile application which is aimed to help users adjust their sleep cycle.
output: The mobile application should have features such as being able to set a gradual sleep schedule, setting reminders for when to go to bed and wake up, tracking sleep patterns and creating customizable goals, and offering advice on how to adjust your sleep cycle. The app should also have features such as tracking time spent in bed, displaying various sleep metrics, and providing access to tutorials and tips to improve your sleeping habits.
